onAreaTouched

public boolean onAreaTouched(TouchEvent pSceneTouchEvent,
                             float pTouchAreaLocalX,
                             float pTouchAreaLocalY)
Description copied from interface: ITouchArea
This method only fires if this ITouchArea is registered to the Scene via Scene.registerTouchArea(ITouchArea).

Specified by:
onAreaTouched in interface ITouchArea
Returns:
true if the event was handled (that means IOnAreaTouchListener of the Scene will not be fired!), otherwise false.

queryForSubclass

public <S extends IEntity> java.util.ArrayList<S> queryForSubclass(IEntityMatcher pEntityMatcher)
                                                        throws java.lang.ClassCastException
Specified by:
queryForSubclass in interface IEntity
Returns:
all children (recursively!) that match the supplied IEntityMatcher.
Throws:
java.lang.ClassCastException - when the supplied IEntityMatcher matched an IEntity that was not of the requested subtype.

sortChildren

public void sortChildren()
Description copied from interface: IEntity
Immediately sorts the IEntitys based on their ZIndex. Sort is stable.

Specified by:
sortChildren in interface IEntity

sortChildren

public void sortChildren(boolean pImmediate)
Description copied from interface: IEntity
Sorts the IEntitys based on their ZIndex. Sort is stable. In contrast to IEntity.sortChildren() this method is particularly useful to avoid multiple sorts per frame.

Specified by:
sortChildren in interface IEntity
Parameters:
pImmediate - if true, the sorting is executed immediately. If false the sorting is executed before the next (visible) drawing of the children of this IEntity.
